notFound.NextSteps: Yi amfani da babban menu don nemo abin da kuke nema.

greeting.Welcome: Barka da zuwa {{1}}. Anan zaku sami abubuwan da aka buga ga membobin al'ummarmu. Da fatan za a ƙara adireshin imel ko lambar wayar hannu don karɓar sanarwa lokacin da aka buga sanarwa.

conversations.NoneYet: Har yanzu ba a sami tattaunawa ba

newConversation.Title: Sabuwar Tattaunawa
newConversation.ContentPlaceholder: Rubuta ƴan kalmomi don fara tattaunawar, don wasu su ba da amsa

events.YouWillRefunded: Za a mayar da ku ta hanyar ƙididdigewa da za ku iya kashewa kan wasu abubuwa a cikin app.

people.Title: Mutane
people.AppAlert: Wannan app a cikin kantin sayar da app zai ba ku damar haɗi tare da abokan ku, da ƙari mai yawa.

community.Title: {{1}} Al'umma
community.YouDontHavePermission: Ba ku da izinin yin wannan
community.NotEnoughCredits: Ba ku da isassun kuɗi don ƙirƙirar al'umma. Bukatar {{1}}, kuna da {{2}}

event.WhichMap: Wadanne taswirori kuke so ku yi amfani da su?

promote.Title: Inganta wannan taron
promote.Prompt: Zaɓi inda kuke son haɓaka wannan taron:

interests.Title: Abubuwan sha'awa
interests.prompt: Zaɓi nau'ikan abubuwan da kuke son sani akai.
interests.explanation: Yawancin abubuwan da kuka zaɓa, mafi kusantar ku za ku iya haɗawa da mutane masu tunani iri ɗaya.
interests.Profile: An ba da fifiko ga sha'awar juna. Idan kuma kuna da ɗaya ko fiye na abubuwan da ke ƙasa, kuna iya {999}} don ƙara su.

credits.Title: Kiredit
credits.EarnCredits: Sami ƙididdige {{1}} ga kowane sabon mutumin da kuka gayyata wanda ya shiga app ɗin

name.AsGuest: An gayyace ku a matsayin bako.
name.AsMember: An gayyace ku a matsayin memba.
name.AsAdmin: An gayyace ku a matsayin admin.
name.AsOwner: An gayyace ku a matsayin mai shi.
name.TooShort: Cikakken sunan ku ba zai iya zama gajere haka ba
name.SetAsYourFullName: Saita {{1}} a matsayin cikakken sunan ku?

interests.Instructions:
A cikin kowane rukunin {{1}} na gaba,
{{2}} duk ayyukan da kuke sha'awar.
Wannan shine yadda kuke haɗawa da sauran mutane a cikin al'umma.

profile.Profile: Bayanan martabarku yana taimaka wa mutane su sami ƙarin sani game da ku.
profile.Birthday: Da fatan za a shigar da ranar haihuwar ku:
profile.Placeholder: Wanene kai kuma me kake yi? Faɗa wa mutane wani abu mai ban sha'awa ko na musamman game da kanku.
profile.Required: Don ci gaba, rubuta aƙalla layi biyu game da kanku.

profile.Title: Bayanan martaba
profile.blockUserAlert: Ba za ku ƙara ganin saƙonni daga wannan mai amfani ba har sai kun buge su.
profile.inviteSuccess: An yi nasarar gayyatar mai amfani azaman {{label}}
profile.aboutPlaceholder: Wanene kai kuma me kake yi? Faɗa wa mutane wani abu mai ban sha'awa ko na musamman game da kanku.
profile.explanation:
Bayanin bayanan ku yana taimakawa mafi dacewa da ku da sauran mutane don ayyukan rukuni.
Da fatan za a shigar da ranar haihuwar ku

composer.creditsChargeRequest: Shin kun yarda ku kashe kuɗi {{price}}?

notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Da fatan za a tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
notifications.ManageEmailSubscriptions: sarrafa biyan kuɗin imel ɗin ku

name.Welcome: Barka da zuwa {{CommunityName}}. Wannan app ɗin zai taimaka muku haɗi tare da abokai, gano sabbin mutane masu buƙatu iri ɗaya, da ƙari mai yawa. Bari mu fara!

icon.Commentary: Saita hoton ku. Wannan shine yadda mutane zasu gan ku akan rukunin yanar gizon.

interests.Commentary: Yawan abubuwan da kuka zaɓa, yawan mutanen da zaku iya saduwa da su.
interests.Notifications: Kuna buƙatar ba da izinin sanarwa

subscriptions.confirm: Fadakarwa suna ba ku damar sanin abubuwan da kuke sha'awar, kamar lokacin da aboki ya shiga app, ko saƙonku.

speak.invite: {{Q.words.TapOrClick}} anan don ganin yadda zaku iya raba wannan tare da sauran mutane.

payment.onContribute: Na gode! Biyan ku ya wuce. Kuna so ku gayyaci abokanku tare da ku?

featureboard.Text_1: Bari a ji muryar ku! Shin kun yarda ya kamata mu haɓaka fasali ko kwaro? Danna maɓallin don tallafawa shi.
featureboard.Text_2: Kuna so mu haɓaka sabon salo? Bayyana shi a kasa.
featureboard.Text_3: Kowane mako muna fara haɓaka fasalin da al'umma ke nema. Duk kuɗin da aka bayar yana tafiya zuwa ga wannan manufar, yana ba mu damar inganta app ɗin.
featureboard.Text_4: Ana amfani da duk kuɗin da aka bayar don taimakawa biyan kuɗin ci gaban mu.
featureboard.Text_5: Shin kuna da ra'ayi don fasali ko bugfix da kuke son mu yi amma ba ku ga wasu suna ƙara ba tukuna? Bayyana shi a ƙasa:

Options.text: $200 Bayanan rajista na Farko na gida
$130 Binciko kuma raba dubban memes na {{1}}

featureboard.FeatureDescription: Bayyana yadda wani zai iya sake haifar da kwaro da kuke gani, ko bayyana dalla-dalla fasalin fasalin da kuke son ginawa.

contribute.ContributeExplanation: Taimaka goyan bayan ci gaba da haɓaka app ɗin {{communityName}}. Duk gudummawar ku na taimakawa wajen gyara kwari da haɓaka sabbin abubuwa don taimakawa haɓaka al'ummar kan layi!
contribute.ReasonToContribute: Magoya bayan {{communityName}} ne ke kula da wannan app. Taimaka tallafawa wannan app don mu iya kawo canji a rayuwar mutane!

import.fileNotFound: Yi haƙuri, ba a sami fayil ɗin CSV ba.
import.fileEmpty: Yi haƙuri, fayil ɗin CSV fanko ne.
import.userIdNotFound: akwai mai amfani amma id fanko
import.fieldNotFound: Ba a samo filin da ake buƙata "{999}}" ba
import.activateUsers: aika saƙon kunnawa ga masu amfani?
import.joinEventLabel: Haɗa masu amfani zuwa taron bazuwar
import.toMainCommunityToo: ƙara masu amfani zuwa babban al'umma kuma
import.willImportedTo: Za a shigo da masu amfani zuwa ga al'umma
